scripts.vercel:install: yarn set version stable && yarn install
scripts.web: yarn build && cd apps/next && yarn next
scripts.build: yarn workspaces foreach --exclude next-app -pi run build
scripts.upgrade:tamagui: manypkg upgrade tamagui && manypkg upgrade @tamagui && manypkg upgrade tamagui-loader && manypkg upgrade react-native-web-lite
scripts.update-supabase-types: env-cmd npx supabase gen types typescript --project-id '$SUPABASE_PROJECT_ID' --schema public > ./packages/app/types/supabase.ts
